name: @wakeupingear/react

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp index.css dist/index.css
scripts.publish: npm run build && NODE_AUTH_TOKEN=$(cat ../../.env | grep NPM_TOKEN | cut -d '=' -f2) bunx nx release publish --projects=@wakeupingear/react --foreground-scripts false

description: Lots of neat universal components to quickly make a site feel good.
author: Abby Farhat
